parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: When performing a paginated query, set the current page number. The default value is **1**.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language type for requests and responses. The default value is **zh**. Values:
- **zh**: Chinese
- **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: When performing a paginated query, set the maximum number of items per page. The default value is 20.

parameters.name: PathNameDesc
parameters.description:
Path name description.
> You can call [ListAvailableAttackPath](~~ListAvailableAttackPath~~) to query the path name descriptions.

parameters.name: PathType
parameters.description:
Path type.
> You can call [ListAvailableAttackPath](~~ListAvailableAttackPath~~) to query the path types.
